string-array.name: QOLE_questions
string-array.item: 1) Did you have a lot of energy ?
2) Have you felt downhearted and low ?
3) How much of the time during the past 4 weeks your epilepsy or antiepileptic drugs have caused trouble with driving (or other transportation) ?
4) How much do your work limitations bother you ?
5) How much do your social limitations bother you ?
6) How much do your memory difficulties bother you ?
7) How much do physical effects of antiepileptic drugs bother you ?
8) How much do psychological effects of antiepileptic drugs bother you ?
9) How afraid are you of having a seizure during the next 4 weeks ?
10) How has your QUALITY OF LIFE been during the past 4 weeks (that is, how have things been going for you) ?
11) How much does the state of your epilepsy-related quality of life distress you overall ?

string-array.name: stigma_questions
string-array.item: 1) People who know that I have a seizure condition treat me differently. ?
2) It really doesn’t matter what I say to people about my seizure condition, they usually have their minds made up. ?
3) I always have to prove myself because of the seizure condition ?
4) Because of my seizure condition, I have problems developing intimate relationships ?
5) In many people’s minds, a seizure condition attaches a stigma or label to me ?
6) I feel different from other adults because of my seizure condition ?
7) I feel embarrassed about my seizure condition ?
8) I feel ashamed to tell others about my seizure condition ?
9) I feel others are un-comfortable with me because of my seizure condition ?
10) I feel others would prefer not to be with me because of my seizure condition ?

string-array.name: who_questions
string-array.item: 1) Standing for long periods such as 30 minutes ?
2) Taking care of your household responsibilities ?
3) Learning a new task, for example, learning how to get to a new place?
4) How much of a problem did you have joining in community activities (for example festivities,religious or other activities) in the same way as anyone else can ?
5) How much have you been emotionally affected by your health problems ?
6) Concentrating on doing something for ten minutes ?
7) Walking a long distance such as kilometre [or equivalent] ?
8) Washing your whole body ?
9) Getting dressed ?
10) Dealing with people you do not know ?
11) Maintaining a friendship ?
12) Your day-to-day work ?

string-array.name: epilepsy_questionaries_2_9
string-array.item: Has your child ever had fits / dauae / mirgee / chamki?
Did your child ever have episodes of loss of consciousness associated with any of the following?
How many such episodes has the child had?
What was the duration between the first and last episode / seizure?
Did your child have these episodes always accompanied by fever? (only if seizure occurred when child was between 6 months - 6 years of age)

Did your child have these episodes only during brain infection (meningitis or encephalitis), head trauma, other infections (diarrhea / pneumonia), or other causes told by your doctor? If yes, please mention the cause if known.
Did your child have these episodes only during the 1st month of life?
Did your child have these episodes associated with change in colour or loss of consciousness in the settings of anger, pain, frustration, or prolonged crying?
Did your child have these episodes after prolonged standing?
Does your child have frequent episodes of "going blank" or losing awareness of surroundings?
Did your child ever have ANY of the following? Sudden and unexplained episodes of falling? Sudden head drop? Sudden jerking movement with bending of the body?
Is the child currently taking any anti-epileptic drug?
Has the child been diagnosed with any of the following? Cerebral Palsy, Development delay, Intellectual disability, Autism, ADHD, Learning disorder

string-array.name: epilepsy_questionnaire_extended
string-array.item: Is there an eyewitness available, either in person or over phone?
Were there any predisposing factors like Severe head injury (unconsciousness of 24 hrs or more), Brain infection, Sleep deprivation, Heavy alcohol use, Illicit drug use?
Is there a colour change to RED or BLUE?
Is there STIFFNESS of hands or legs?
Is there SHAKING of hands or legs?
Is there TONGUE BITE?
Is there INCONTINENCE of urine or stool?
Does the head turn to RIGHT or LEFT?
Are the Eyes CLOSED?
Able to COMMUNICATE?
Is there WEAKNESS on only one side?
